reviewText: An excellent documentary examining an eccentric and talented performer who has transformed himself through his art.  Feeling himself to be a stranger in a strange land due to his multi-ethnic background, Thoth has created an ideal fantasy world  to counter the racist realities he experienced at the hands of others when he was a child.  You have to respect his ability to carry several others along with him during his performances, and even though they have no idea where they have been taken they obviously realize it hints at a better place than the one they currently inhabit.
